descriptionHtml:
This mod adds one sword to the daedric forge category (See image to see where)

[img]http://gyazo.com/0c2f4ec92fc3af773629c650c0f9a70a.png[/img]

I was originally going to keep it to myself but decided to upload it.
Under no circumstance is this mod to be loaded any where else (NEXUS ONLY)

Has a very simple scabbard.

Its base damage is 24
(it has 75 damage in the picture because of my smiting skill and one handed skill)

Nothing else was changed. I don\'t consider it to be over powered but if you do then feel free to make the adjustment in CK for yourself.
It has been styled to look more brutish than anything else. has HD textures,

I would also like to thank all the people who suggested names for a sword i posted a while back.
I have used some of those names, so for this one thank you Victoria G for the name...
Sorry no requests, if you have a problem feel free to post it and a fix will be uploaded as soon as i see the post.
author: DeMoNhUnTeR1986
